full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### CH149 Cormorant Search and Rescue Helicopter
#### Reference Number: PW-RWS-002-29161
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-226481/C
#### Publication Date: September 7, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: September 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
#### Location: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
### Supply Notice
#### Type: Request for Information
#### Description:

This solicitation follows the Letter of Interest (LOI) for the New Sustainment Enterprise (SE) for the CH-149 Cormorant Helicopter Fleet. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on the procurement.

#### Specific Requirements:

The procurement involves repair and overhaul services for military helicopters. Only bidders who have the necessary expertise and certifications for this type of work will be considered.

#### Recent Procurement History:

Previous solicitations for this requirement were published on June 21, 2021, and July 26, 2022. 

#### Opportunities:

The contract will be awarded to the best bidder, with a focus on providing high-quality services at a competitive price.

#### Documents:
Download the supply notice document in either official language of Canada from the [Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/09/06/7d51d3bd24b9c4c16071066eb5e08b62/ABES.PROD.PW_RWS.B002.E29161.EBSU000.PDF).

#### Contact Information:

Ciano Erica
Director
Phone: (343) 998-6924
Email: [derrick.rodricks@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:derrick.rodricks@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Language of Tender:

The tender will be accepted in either official language of Canada.

Note: I made certain changes to the original text, while trying to maintain the meaning and intent. Please let me know if you want me to make any further adjustments.


---

Let me know if you have any concerns or need changes. I hope the new format is more suitable for your needs. Let me know if you have any further requests or if you need me to clarify anything.
